rukus.text: Lam Yakuni Al-Ladhina Kafaru Min 'Ahli Al-Kitabi Wa Al-Mushrikina Munfakkina Hatta Ta'tiyahumu Al-Bayyinahu
Rasulun Mina Allahi Yatlu Suhufaan Mutahharahan
Wa Ma Tafarraqa Al-Ladhina 'Utu Al-Kitaba 'Illa Min Ba`di Ma Ja'at/humu Al-Bayyinahu
Wa Ma 'Umiru 'Illa Liya`budu Allaha Mukhlisina Lahu Ad-Dina Hunafa'a Wa Yuqimu As-Salaata Wa Yu'utu Az-Zakaata Wa Dhalika Dinu Al-Qayyimahi
Inna Al-Ladhina Kafaru Min 'Ahli Al-Kitabi Wa Al-Mushrikina Fi Nari Jahannama Khalidina Fiha 'Ula'ika Hum Sharru Al-Bariyahi
Inna Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Amilu As-Salihati 'Ula'ika Hum Khayru Al-Bariyahi
Jaza'uuhum `Inda Rabbihim Jannatu `Adnin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Khalidina Fiha 'Abadaan Rađiya Allahu `Anhum Wa Rađu `Anhu Dhalika Liman Khashiya Rabbahu
